text: William Chervy (3 June 1937 â€“ 12 February 2021) was a French politician. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was Mayor of Saint-Vaury from 1971 to 2001. He was a Senator from Creuse from 1981 to 1998. Chervy died on 12 February 2021, aged 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors
title: William Chervy
